articles.description: Latest football news, and all the reaction to the weekend's Premier League matches as Arsenal stay ahead of Manchester City in the title race, while Bristol City are relegated from the WSL.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Arsenal stay ahead of Man City in title race

articles.description: Arsenal survive painful flashbacks of giving up handsome leads last season to maintain their Premier League title push at Tottenham, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Tottenham 2-3 Arsenal: 'Arsenal survive painful flashbacks to maintain title push'

articles.description: Brazilian centre-back Thiago Silva will leave Chelsea at the end of the 2023-24 season.
articles.title: Thiago Silva: Chelsea defender to leave club at end of season

articles.description: The LA Clippers hold off an epic fightback from the Dallas Mavericks to win 116-111 and level the best-of-seven series at 2-2 in the Western Conference play-offs.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: LA Clippers hold off epic Dallas Mavericks fightback to level series

articles.description: Daria Kasatkina, one of the few openly gay players on the WTA Tour, says she has been “given guarantees” about her safety should she compete in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: WTA Finals: Daria Kasatkina 'given guarantees' on safety for gay players

articles.description: British heavyweight Anthony Joshua believes his next fight will be in September, at Wembley Stadium in London.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua expects to fight at Wembley Stadium in September

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from the fourth day of week four of the 2024 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Score, commentary & updates from day four of week four

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles one player from each team who stood out in this year's Women's Six Nations.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations 2024: Six standout stars from tournament

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Tuesday's Champions League game between Bayern Munich and Real Madrid.
articles.title: Kane & Bellingham set for Champions League showdown

articles.description: England's Kris Kim, 16, is looking forward to an "amazing opportunity" when he makes his PGA Tour debut in Texas this week.
articles.title: Kris Kim: English teenager to make PGA Tour debut at CJ Cup in Texas this week
